subtitleNullable: Segmentation of clothes for recommendation/search system - ecommerce dataset
descriptionNullable:
# Clothing on people for the recommendation system, ecommerce dataset
An example of a dataset with exceptionally high quality (99.8%) for clothes segmentation in images made by people. 
Segmentation was carried out by 24 classes (human body and clothing). 
**Scope of application**: search applications, recommendation systems, design, meta universe and marketplaces.

# 💴 For Commercial Usage: To discuss your requirements, learn about the price and buy the dataset, leave a request on **[TrainingData](https://trainingdata.pro/datasets/fashion-images-segmentation?utm_source=kaggle&utm_medium=cpc&utm_campaign=segmentation-of-people-in-fulllength-clothing)** to buy the dataset

## SIMILAR DATASETS:
- **[Body Segmentation - 5,300 Photos](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/trainingdatapro/human-segmentation-dataset)**
- **[SheIn E-Commerce Dataset - 109,000 products](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/trainingdatapro/shein-e-commerce-dataset)**
- **[Retail Product Recognition on Grocery Shelves](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/trainingdatapro/product-facing-dataset)**
- **[Face segmentation](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/tapakah68/face-segmentation)**
- **[Selfies, ID Images dataset (5591 sets of 15 files)](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/tapakah68/selfies-id-images-dataset)**

# Content
Includes:  
- img - raw images 
- masks - segmentation masks for original photos

# 💴 Buy the Dataset: This is just an example of the data. Leave a request on **[https://trainingdata.pro/datasets](https://trainingdata.pro/datasets/fashion-images-segmentation?utm_source=kaggle&utm_medium=cpc&utm_campaign=segmentation-of-people-in-fulllength-clothing)** to discuss your requirements, learn about the price and buy the dataset.

# **[TrainingData](https://trainingdata.pro/datasets/fashion-images-segmentation?utm_source=kaggle&utm_medium=cpc&utm_campaign=segmentation-of-people-in-fulllength-clothing)** provides high-quality data annotation tailored to your needs.
